Package org.openmobster.core.security.identity

Class Summary
Group Represents a Group/Role of Identities in the System.
GroupAttribute Represents arbitrary information to be associated with the Group
GroupController Control data storage functions of Group objects
Identity Represents a User registered with the system
IdentityAttribute Represents arbitrary information that can be associated with an Identity in the system
IdentityController Control data storage functions of Identity objects
